contexts.context: Then Ayem <mark>threw</mark> the netchiman's wife into the ocean water where dreughs...
...the approach of the Guar, scuttled off, and <mark>threw</mark> themselves into the water. 'Truly,' said one...
...slipped in through a duct and vanished below. Galsiah <mark>threw</mark> on her shawl, muddied her face to resemble...
